verses.verse: And take <S%H7126><s%> you unto you Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him <S%H8432><s%>, from among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office, even Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>.
And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> for glory <S%H3519><s%> and for beauty <S%H8597><s%>.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto all that are wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%>, whom I have filled <S%H4390><s%> with the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, that they may make <S%H6213><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s garments <S%H899><s%> to consecrate <S%H6942><s%> him <S%H3547><s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.

And these are the garments <S%H899><s%> which they shall make <S%H6213><s%>; a breastplate <S%H2833><s%>, and an ephod <S%H646><s%>, and a robe <S%H4598><s%>, and a checkered <S%H8665><s%> coat <S%H3801><s%>, a turban <S%H4701><s%>, and a belt <S%H73><s%>: and they shall make <S%H6213><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>.

And they shall make <S%H6213><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and of purple <S%H713><s%>, of scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, with cunning <S%H2803><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>.
It shall have the two <S%H8147><s%> shoulderpieces <S%H3802><s%> there joined <S%H2266><s%> at the two <S%H8147><s%> edges <S%H7098><s%> there and so it shall be joined together <S%H2266><s%>.

And the curious belt <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H642><s%>, which is upon it <S%H4639><s%>, shall be of the same, according to the work there even of gold <S%H2091><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>.
And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and engrave <S%H6605><s%> on them the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

Six <S%H8337><s%> of their names <S%H8034><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, and the other six <S%H8337><s%> names <S%H8034><s%> of the rest <S%H3498><s%> on the other <S%H8145><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, according to their birth <S%H8435><s%>.

With the work <S%H4639><s%> of an engraver <S%H2796><s%> in stone <S%H68><s%>, like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, shall you engrave <S%H6605><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> with the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them to be set <S%H4142><s%> in settings <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> upon the shoulders <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> for stones <S%H68><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall carry <S%H5375><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> upon his two <S%H8147><s%> shoulders <S%H3802><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%>.
And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> settings <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>;

And two <S%H8147><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> at the ends <S%H4020><s%>; of braided <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>, and fasten the braided <S%H5688><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> to the settings <S%H4865><s%>.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%> with cunning <S%H2803><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>; after the work <S%H4639><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H2091><s%>; of gold, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and of purple <S%H713><s%>, and of scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, shall you make it <S%H6213><s%>.
Foursquare <S%H7251><s%> it shall be being doubled <S%H3717><s%>; a span <S%H2239><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> there and a span <S%H2239><s%> shall be the breadth there <S%H7341><s%>

And you shall set <S%H4390><s%> in it settings <S%H4396><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>, even four <S%H702><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>: the first row <S%H2905><s%> shall be a sardius <S%H124><s%>, a topaz <S%H6357><s%>, and a carbuncle <S%H1304><s%>: this shall be the first <S%H259><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>.
And the second <S%H8145><s%> row <S%H2905><s%> shall be an emerald <S%H5306><s%>, a sapphire <S%H5601><s%>, and a diamond <S%H3095><s%>.
And the third <S%H7992><s%> row <S%H2905><s%> a jacinth <S%H3958><s%>, an agate <S%H7618><s%>, and an amethyst <S%H306><s%>.

And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> row <S%H2905><s%> a beryl <S%H8658><s%>, and an onyx <S%H7718><s%>, and a jasper <S%H3471><s%>: they shall be set <S%H7660><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%> in their settings <S%H4396><s%>.

And the stones <S%H68><s%> shall be with the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>, according to their names <S%H8034><s%>, like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>; every one <S%H376><s%> with his name <S%H8034><s%> shall they be according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> upon the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> chains <S%H8331><s%> at the ends <S%H1383><s%> of braided <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> upon the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> braided <S%H5688><s%> chains of gold <S%H2091><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> which are on the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.

And the other two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> braided <S%H5688><s%> chains you shall fasten <S%H5414><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> settings <S%H4865><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the shoulderpieces <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it <S%H4136><s%>.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> them upon the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> in the border <S%H8193><s%> there which is in the side <S%H5676><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> inward <S%H1004><s%>.

And two <S%H8147><s%> other rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> underneath <S%H4295><s%>, toward <S%H4136><s%> the forepart <S%H6440><s%> there over against <S%H5980><s%> the other coupling <S%H4225><s%> there above <S%H4605><s%> the curious belt <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>.

And they shall bind <S%H7405><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> by the rings <S%H2885><s%> there unto the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> with a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, that it may be above the curious belt <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and that the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> be not loosed <S%H2118><s%> from the ephod <S%H646><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall carry <S%H5375><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%> upon his heart <S%H3820><s%>, when he goes <S%H935><s%> in unto the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H2146><s%>, for a memorial before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> in the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%> the Urim <S%H224><s%> and the Thummim <S%H8550><s%>; and they shall be upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%>, when he goes <S%H935><s%> in before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall carry <S%H5375><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> upon his heart <S%H3820><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> all <S%H3632><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>.

And there shall be an hole <S%H6310><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of it <S%H8432><s%>, in the middle there it shall have a binding <S%H8193><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the hole <S%H6310><s%> of it <S%H6310><s%>, as it were the hole of an coat of mail <S%H8473><s%>, that it be not tore <S%H7167><s%>.

And beneath upon the hem <S%H7757><s%> of it you shall make <S%H6213><s%> pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and of purple <S%H713><s%>, and of scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, round about <S%H5439><s%> the hem <S%H7757><s%> there and bells <S%H6472><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> them round about <S%H5439><s%>:

A golden <S%H2091><s%> bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, a golden <S%H2091><s%> bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, upon the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And it shall be upon Aaron <S%H175><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%>: and his sound <S%H6963><s%> shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> when he goes <S%H935><s%> in unto the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and when he comes <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H4191><s%>, that he die not.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a plate <S%H6731><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and engrave <S%H6605><s%> upon it <S%H6603><s%>, like the engravings of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, HOLINESS <S%H6944><s%> TO THE Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> it on a blue <S%H8504><s%> lace <S%H6616><s%>, that it may be upon the turban <S%H4701><s%>; upon the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the turban it shall be <S%H4701><s%>.

And it shall be upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s forehead <S%H4696><s%>, that Aaron <S%H175><s%> may carry <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, which the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> in all their holy <S%H6944><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%>; and it shall be always <S%H8548><s%> upon his forehead <S%H4696><s%>, that they may be accepted <S%H7522><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And you shall embroider <S%H7660><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the belt <S%H73><s%> of needlework <S%H7551><s%>.

And for Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> coats <S%H3801><s%>, and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> for them girdles <S%H73><s%>, and caps <S%H4021><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> for them <S%H3519><s%>, for glory and for beauty <S%H8597><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H3847><s%> them upon Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him <S%H4886><s%>; and shall anoint them <S%H4390><s%>, and consecrate them <S%H6942><s%>, and sanctify them <S%H3547><s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them linen <S%H906><s%> underwear <S%H4370><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> their nakedness <S%H1320><s%>; from the body <S%H4975><s%> even unto the thighs they shall reach <S%H3409><s%>:

And they shall be upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>, when they come <S%H935><s%> in unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, or when they come near <S%H5066><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H5375><s%>; that they carry not iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and die <S%H4191><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> unto him and his seed <S%H2233><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>.
